item.title: Traveling Salesman Problem in R with Location Data
item.description: Being locked down gave me an idea: If I could travel, whats the shortest distance to visit all Australian football grounds? To answer this question, I’m going to be exploring one of the most famous optimisation problems in mathematics: the Traveling Salesman Problem, or a Travelling Footballer Problem. The data Here’s some data I prepared earlier, 17 venues with corresponding latitude and longitude.
